named-query.name: CustomerVO.countCustomerName
named-query.query: select count(b.customerName) from CustomerVO b where b.customerName = :customerName and b.ifNew = 0

named-query.name: CustomerVO.countIdentityNo
named-query.query: select count(b.identityNo) from CustomerVO b where b.identityNo = :identityNo and b.ifNew = 0

named-query.name: CustomerVO.queryCustomerStatusByName
named-query.query: select vo from CustomerVO vo where vo.customerName = :customerName and vo.customerStatus = :customerStatus and vo.customerType= :customerType and vo.ifNew = 0

named-query.name: CustomerVO.batchDeleteByPks
named-query.query: delete from CustomerVO a where a.pkCustomer in (:pks)

named-query.name: CustomerCorpAllVO.findByCustomerName
named-query.query: select b from CustomerCorpAllVO b where b.customerName = :customerName AND b.ifNew = 0

named-query.name: CustomerCorpAllVO.findByPkCustomer
named-query.query: select b from CustomerCorpAllVO b where b.pkCustomer = :pkCustomer AND b.ifNew = 0

named-query.name: corpPageQuery
named-query.query: select b from CustomerCorpAllVO b where b.ifNew = 0 and b.customerType = 0 order by b.ts desc

named-query.name: corpPageQuery.count
named-query.query: select count(b.pkCustomer) from CustomerCorpAllVO b where b.ifNew = 0 and b.customerType = 0

named-query.name: CustomerCorpVO.batchDeleteByPks
named-query.query: delete from CustomerCorpVO a where a.pkCustomer in (:pks)

named-query.name: deleteForType
named-query.query: delete from CustRelatedCompanyVO b where b.pkCustomer = :pkCustomer and b.billType=:billType and b.executiveType =:executiveType

named-native-query.name: getCustRelatedCompany1
named-native-query.query: SELECT CR.PK_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY AS PK_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY, CR.PK_CUSTOMER AS PK_CUSTOMER, CR.PK_CUSTOMER_REF AS PK_CUSTOMER_REF, C.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUST_REF_CODE FROM YLS_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY CR LEFT JOIN YLS_CUSTOMER C ON C.PK_CUSTOMER = CR.PK_CUSTOMER_REF WHERE CR.PK_CUSTOMER = :pkCustomer AND CR.BILLTYPE = :billType

named-native-query.name: getCustRelatedCompany2
named-native-query.query: SELECT CR.PK_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY AS PK_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY, CR.PK_CUSTOMER AS PK_CUSTOMER, CR.PK_CUSTOMER_REF AS PK_CUSTOMER_REF, C.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUST_REF_CODE FROM YLS_CUST_RELATED_COMPANY CR LEFT JOIN YLS_CUSTOMER C ON C.PK_CUSTOMER = CR.PK_CUSTOMER_REF WHERE CR.PK_CUSTOMER = :pkCustomer AND CR.BILLTYPE = :billType AND CR.EXECUTIVE_TYPE = :executiveType

named-query.name: CustShareHoldersVO.queryHoldersByPkCustomer
named-query.query: select a from CustShareHoldersVO a where a.pkCustomer = :pkCustomer

named-query.name: custQualificationPageQuery
named-query.query: select a from CustQualificationVO a left join fetch a.pkCustomer left join fetch a.pkOperator left join fetch a.pkChecker left join fetch a.pkGrantor
